code: import React from"react";import coinIcon from"./assets/icons/coin-header.png";import menuIcon from"./assets/icons/menu.png";import chatIcon from"./assets/icons/chat.png";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import"./Header.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Header=_ref=>{let{walletAC,userId}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("header",{className:"header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"left-section",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/setting/".concat(userId),className:"menusetting-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:menuIcon,alt:"Menu",className:"menu-icon"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"coins",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:coinIcon,alt:"Coin",className:"coin-icon"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:walletAC})," "]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:chatIcon,alt:"Chat",className:"chat-icon"})})]});};export default Header;
